  • メソッド
org.interledger.ilp

インタフェース InterledgerProtocolError.ErrorCode

  • 含まれているインタフェース:
    InterledgerProtocolError

    public static interface InterledgerProtocolError.ErrorCode
    Inspired by HTTP Status Codes, ILP error codes are categorized based upon the intended behavior of the caller when they receive the given error.
    関連項目:
    "https://github.com/interledger/rfcs/blob/master/0003-interledger-protocol/0003-interledger-protocol.md#ilp-error-codes"

    • ネストされたクラスのサマリー

      ネストされたクラス 
      修飾子とタイプ インタフェースと説明
      static class  InterledgerProtocolError.ErrorCode.Builder
      A builder for constructing instances of InterledgerProtocolError.ErrorCode.
      static class  InterledgerProtocolError.ErrorCode.ErrorFamily
      The family of an InterledgerProtocolError.ErrorCode, used as a grouping semantic, which is determined by the first letter of the error code's code value.

    • フィールドのサマリー

      フィールド 
      修飾子とタイプ フィールドと説明
      static InterledgerProtocolError.ErrorCode F00_BAD_REQUEST
      Generic sender error.
      static InterledgerProtocolError.ErrorCode F01_INVALID_PACKET
      The ILP packet was syntactically invalid.
      static InterledgerProtocolError.ErrorCode F02_UNREACHABLE
      There was no way to forward the payment, because the destination ILP address was wrong or the connector does not have a route to the destination.
      static InterledgerProtocolError.ErrorCode F03_INVALID_AMOUNT
      The amount is invalid, for example it contains more digits of precision than are available on the destination ledger or the amount is greater than the total amount of the given asset in existence.
      static InterledgerProtocolError.ErrorCode F04_INSUFFICIENT_DST_AMOUNT
      The receiver deemed the amount insufficient, for example you tried to pay a $100 invoice with $10.
      static InterledgerProtocolError.ErrorCode F05_WRONG_CONDITION
      The receiver generated a different condition and cannot fulfill the payment.
      static InterledgerProtocolError.ErrorCode F06_UNEXPECTED_PAYMENT
      The receiver was not expecting a payment like this = ErrorCode.of(the memo and destination address don't make sense in that combination, for example if the receiver does not understand the transport protocol used)
      static InterledgerProtocolError.ErrorCode F07_CANNOT_RECEIVE
      The receiver is unable to accept this payment due to a constraint.
      static InterledgerProtocolError.ErrorCode F99_APPLICATION_ERROR
      Reserved for application layer protocols.
      static InterledgerProtocolError.ErrorCode R00_TRANSFER_TIMED_OUT
      The transfer timed out, meaning the next party in the chain did not respond.
      static InterledgerProtocolError.ErrorCode R01_INSUFFICIENT_SOURCE_AMOUNT
      Either the sender did not send enough money or the exchange rate changed before the payment was prepared.
      static InterledgerProtocolError.ErrorCode R02_INSUFFICIENT_TIMEOUT
      The connector could not forward the payment, because the timeout was too low to subtract its safety margin.
      static InterledgerProtocolError.ErrorCode R99_APPLICATION_ERROR
      Reserved for application layer protocols.
      static InterledgerProtocolError.ErrorCode T00_INTERNAL_ERROR
      A generic unexpected exception.
      static InterledgerProtocolError.ErrorCode T01_LEDGER_UNREACHABLE
      The connector has a route or partial route to the destination but was unable to reach the next ledger.
      static InterledgerProtocolError.ErrorCode T02_LEDGER_BUSY
      The ledger is rejecting requests due to overloading.
      static InterledgerProtocolError.ErrorCode T03_CONNECTOR_BUSY
      The connector is rejecting requests due to overloading.
      static InterledgerProtocolError.ErrorCode T04_INSUFFICIENT_LIQUIDITY
      The connector would like to fulfill your request, but it doesn't currently have enough money.
      static InterledgerProtocolError.ErrorCode T05_RATE_LIMITED
      The sender is sending too many payments and is being rate-limited by a ledger or connector.
      static InterledgerProtocolError.ErrorCode T99_APPLICATION_ERROR
      Reserved for application layer protocols.

      Accessor for this code's error family.

      Accessor for this error code's name.

    • フィールドの詳細

      • F00_BAD_REQUEST

        static final InterledgerProtocolError.ErrorCode F00_BAD_REQUEST
        Generic sender error.

      • F01_INVALID_PACKET

        static final InterledgerProtocolError.ErrorCode F01_INVALID_PACKET
        The ILP packet was syntactically invalid.

      • F02_UNREACHABLE

        static final InterledgerProtocolError.ErrorCode F02_UNREACHABLE
        There was no way to forward the payment, because the destination ILP address was wrong or the connector does not have a route to the destination.

      • F03_INVALID_AMOUNT

        static final InterledgerProtocolError.ErrorCode F03_INVALID_AMOUNT
        The amount is invalid, for example it contains more digits of precision than are available on the destination ledger or the amount is greater than the total amount of the given asset in existence.

      • F04_INSUFFICIENT_DST_AMOUNT

        static final InterledgerProtocolError.ErrorCode F04_INSUFFICIENT_DST_AMOUNT
        The receiver deemed the amount insufficient, for example you tried to pay a $100 invoice with $10.

      • F05_WRONG_CONDITION

        static final InterledgerProtocolError.ErrorCode F05_WRONG_CONDITION
        The receiver generated a different condition and cannot fulfill the payment.

      • F06_UNEXPECTED_PAYMENT

        static final InterledgerProtocolError.ErrorCode F06_UNEXPECTED_PAYMENT
        The receiver was not expecting a payment like this = ErrorCode.of(the memo and destination address don't make sense in that combination, for example if the receiver does not understand the transport protocol used)

      • F07_CANNOT_RECEIVE

        static final InterledgerProtocolError.ErrorCode F07_CANNOT_RECEIVE
        The receiver is unable to accept this payment due to a constraint. For example, the payment would put the receiver above its maximum account balance.

      • F99_APPLICATION_ERROR

        static final InterledgerProtocolError.ErrorCode F99_APPLICATION_ERROR
        Reserved for application layer protocols. Applications MAY use names other than Application Error.

      • T00_INTERNAL_ERROR

        static final InterledgerProtocolError.ErrorCode T00_INTERNAL_ERROR
        A generic unexpected exception. This usually indicates a bug or unhandled error case.

      • T01_LEDGER_UNREACHABLE

        static final InterledgerProtocolError.ErrorCode T01_LEDGER_UNREACHABLE
        The connector has a route or partial route to the destination but was unable to reach the next ledger. Try again later.

      • T02_LEDGER_BUSY

        static final InterledgerProtocolError.ErrorCode T02_LEDGER_BUSY
        The ledger is rejecting requests due to overloading. Try again later.

      • T03_CONNECTOR_BUSY

        static final InterledgerProtocolError.ErrorCode T03_CONNECTOR_BUSY
        The connector is rejecting requests due to overloading. Try again later.

      • T04_INSUFFICIENT_LIQUIDITY

        static final InterledgerProtocolError.ErrorCode T04_INSUFFICIENT_LIQUIDITY
        The connector would like to fulfill your request, but it doesn't currently have enough money. Try again later.

      • T05_RATE_LIMITED

        static final InterledgerProtocolError.ErrorCode T05_RATE_LIMITED
        The sender is sending too many payments and is being rate-limited by a ledger or connector. If a connector gets this error because they are being rate-limited, they SHOULD retry the payment through a different route or respond to the sender with a T03: Connector Busy error.

      • T99_APPLICATION_ERROR

        static final InterledgerProtocolError.ErrorCode T99_APPLICATION_ERROR
        Reserved for application layer protocols. Applications MAY use names other than Application Error.

      • R00_TRANSFER_TIMED_OUT

        static final InterledgerProtocolError.ErrorCode R00_TRANSFER_TIMED_OUT
        The transfer timed out, meaning the next party in the chain did not respond. This could be because you set your timeout too low or because something look longer than it should. The sender MAY try again with a higher expiry, but they SHOULD NOT do this indefinitely or a malicious connector could cause them to tie up their money for an unreasonably long time.

      • R01_INSUFFICIENT_SOURCE_AMOUNT

        static final InterledgerProtocolError.ErrorCode R01_INSUFFICIENT_SOURCE_AMOUNT
        Either the sender did not send enough money or the exchange rate changed before the payment was prepared. The sender MAY try again with a higher amount, but they SHOULD NOT do this indefinitely or a malicious connector could steal money from them.

      • R02_INSUFFICIENT_TIMEOUT

        static final InterledgerProtocolError.ErrorCode R02_INSUFFICIENT_TIMEOUT
        The connector could not forward the payment, because the timeout was too low to subtract its safety margin. The sender MAY try again with a higher expiry, but they SHOULD NOT do this indefinitely or a malicious connector could cause them to tie up their money for an unreasonably long time.

      • R99_APPLICATION_ERROR

        static final InterledgerProtocolError.ErrorCode R99_APPLICATION_ERROR
        Reserved for application layer protocols. Applications MAY use names other than Application Error.

    • メソッドの詳細

      • getCode

        String getCode()
        Accessor for this error's code, which is the definitive identifier of an Interledger Protocol error. For example, "F00".
        戻り値:
        The code of the error.

      • getName

        String getName()

        Accessor for this error code's name.

        Implementations SHOULD NOT depend on this name, but should instead depend on the code defined above. This name is primarily provided as a convenience to facilitate debugging by humans. If the name does not match the code, the code is the definitive identifier of the error.

        戻り値:
        The name of the error code.

      • getErrorFamily

        InterledgerProtocolError.ErrorCode.ErrorFamily getErrorFamily()
        Accessor for this code's error family.
        戻り値:
        A InterledgerProtocolError.ErrorCode.ErrorFamily.

      • of

        static InterledgerProtocolError.ErrorCode of(String code,
                                             String name)
        Helper method to construct an instance of InterledgerProtocolError.ErrorCode.
        パラメータ:
        code - The definitive identifier of the error.
        name - The name of the error code.
        戻り値:
        An InterledgerProtocolError.ErrorCode
